title: 旧约 - 利未记(Leviticus) - 第 26 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 利未记(Leviticus) -- 第 26 章 ( 本篇共有 27 章 )

lineList.en: Ye shall make you no idols nor graven image, neither rear you up a standing image, neither shall ye set up any image of stone in your land, to bow down unto it: for I am the LORD your God.
lineList.cn: 你们不可作什么虚无的神像，不可立雕刻的偶像或是柱像，也不可在你们的地上安什么錾成的石像，向它跪拜，因为我是耶和华你们的神。

lineList.en: Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I am the LORD.
lineList.cn: 你们要守我的安息日，敬我的圣所。我是耶和华。

lineList.en: If ye walk in my statutes, and keep my commandments, and do them;
lineList.cn: 你们若遵行我的律例，谨守我的诫命，

lineList.en: Then I will give you rain in due season, and the land shall yield her increase, and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.
lineList.cn: 我就给你们降下时雨，叫地生出土产，田野的树木结果子。

lineList.en: And your threshing shall reach unto the vintage, and the vintage shall reach unto the sowing time: and ye shall eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely.
lineList.cn: 你们打粮食要打到摘葡萄的时候，摘葡萄要摘到撒种的时候，并且要吃得饱足，在你们的地上安然居住。

lineList.en: And I will give peace in the land, and ye shall lie down, and none shall make you afraid: and I will rid evil beasts out of the land, neither shall the sword go through your land.
lineList.cn: 我要赐平安在你们的地上，你们躺卧，无人惊吓。我要叫恶兽从你们的地上息灭，刀剑也必不经过你们的地。

lineList.en: And ye shall chase your enemies, and they shall fall before you by the sword.
lineList.cn: 你们要追赶仇敌，他们必倒在你们刀下。

lineList.en: And five of you shall chase an hundred, and an hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight: and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword.
lineList.cn: 你们五个人要追赶一百人，一百人要追赶一万人，仇敌必倒在你们刀下。

lineList.en: For I will have respect unto you, and make you fruitful, and multiply you, and establish my covenant with you.
lineList.cn: 我要眷顾你们，使你们生养众多，也要与你们坚定所立的约。

lineList.en: And ye shall eat old store, and bring forth the old because of the new.
lineList.cn: 你们要吃陈粮，又因新粮挪开陈粮。

lineList.en: And I will set my tabernacle among you: and my soul shall not abhor you.
lineList.cn: 我要在你们中间立我的帐幕，我的心也不厌恶你们。

lineList.en: And I will walk among you, and will be your God, and ye shall be my people.
lineList.cn: 我要在你们中间行走，我要作你们的神，你们要作我的子民。

lineList.en: I am the LORD your God, which brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, that ye should not be their bondmen; and I have broken the bands of your yoke, and made you go upright.
lineList.cn: 我是耶和华你们的神，曾将你们从埃及地领出来，使你们不作埃及人的奴仆，我也折断你们所负的轭，叫你们挺身而走。

lineList.en: But if ye will not hearken unto me, and will not do all these commandments;
lineList.cn: 你们若不听从我，不遵行我的诫命，

lineList.en: And if ye shall despise my statutes, or if your soul abhor my judgments, so that ye will not do all my commandments, but that ye break my covenant:
lineList.cn: 厌弃我的律例，厌恶我的典章，不遵行我一切的诫命，背弃我的约，

lineList.en: I also will do this unto you; I will even appoint over you terror, consumption, and the burning ague, that shall consume the eyes, and cause sorrow of heart: and ye shall sow your seed in vain, for your enemies shall eat it.
lineList.cn: 我待你们就要这样，我必命定惊惶，叫眼目乾瘪，精神消耗的痨病热病辖制你们。你们也要白白地撒种，因为仇敌要吃你们所种的。

lineList.en: And I will set my face against you, and ye shall be slain before your enemies: they that hate you shall reign over you; and ye shall flee when none pursueth you.
lineList.cn: 我要向你们变脸，你们就要败在仇敌面前。恨恶你们的，必辖管你们，无人追赶，你们却要逃跑。

lineList.en: And if ye will not yet for all this hearken unto me, then I will punish you seven times more for your sins.
lineList.cn: 你们因这些事若还不听从我，我就要为你们的罪加七倍惩罚你们。

lineList.en: And I will break the pride of your power; and I will make your heaven as iron, and your earth as brass:
lineList.cn: 我必断绝你们因势力而有的骄傲，又要使覆你们的天如铁，载你们的地如铜。

lineList.en: And your strength shall be spent in vain: for your land shall not yield her increase, neither shall the trees of the land yield their fruits.
lineList.cn: 你们要白白地劳力，因为你们的地不出土产，其上的树木也不结果子。

lineList.en: And if ye walk contrary unto me, and will not hearken unto me; I will bring seven times more plagues upon you according to your sins.
lineList.cn: 你们行事若与我反对，不肯听从我，我就要按你们的罪加七倍降灾与你们。

lineList.en: I will also send wild beasts among you, which shall rob you of your children, and destroy your cattle, and make you few in number; and your high ways shall be desolate.
lineList.cn: 我也要打发野地的走兽到你们中间，抢吃你们的儿女，吞灭你们的牲畜，使你们的人数减少，道路荒凉。

lineList.en: And if ye will not be reformed by me by these things, but will walk contrary unto me;
lineList.cn: 你们因这些事若仍不改正归我，行事与我反对，

lineList.en: Then will I also walk contrary unto you, and will punish you yet seven times for your sins.
lineList.cn: 我就要行事与你们反对，因你们的罪击打你们七次。

lineList.en: And I will bring a sword upon you, that shall avenge the quarrel of my covenant: and when ye are gathered together within your cities, I will send the pestilence among you; and ye shall be delivered into the hand of the enemy.
lineList.cn: 我又要使刀剑临到你们，报复你们背约的仇，聚集你们在各城内，降瘟疫在你们中间，也必将你们交在仇敌的手中。

lineList.en: And when I have broken the staff of your bread, ten women shall bake your bread in one oven, and they shall deliver you your bread again by weight: and ye shall eat, and not be satisfied.
lineList.cn: 我要折断你们的杖，就是断绝你们的粮。那时，必有十个女人在一个炉子给你们烤饼，按分量秤给你们，你们要吃，也吃不饱。

lineList.en: And if ye will not for all this hearken unto me, but walk contrary unto me;
lineList.cn: 你们因这一切的事若不听从我，却行事与我反对，

lineList.en: Then I will walk contrary unto you also in fury; and I, even I, will chastise you seven times for your sins.
lineList.cn: 我就要发烈怒，行事与你们反对，又因你们的罪惩罚你们七次。

lineList.en: And ye shall eat the flesh of your sons, and the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat.
lineList.cn: 并且你们要吃儿子的肉，也要吃女儿的肉。

lineList.en: And I will destroy your high places, and cut down your images, and cast your carcases upon the carcases of your idols, and my soul shall abhor you.
lineList.cn: 我又要毁坏你们的邱坛，砍下你们的日像，把你们的尸首扔在你们偶像的身上，我的心也必厌恶你们。

lineList.en: And I will make your cities waste, and bring your sanctuaries unto desolation, and I will not smell the savour of your sweet odours.
lineList.cn: 我要使你们的城邑变为荒凉，使你们的众圣所成为荒场，我也不闻你们馨香的香气。

lineList.en: And I will bring the land into desolation: and your enemies which dwell therein shall be astonished at it.
lineList.cn: 我要使地成为荒场，住在其上的仇敌就因此诧异。

lineList.en: And I will scatter you among the heathen, and will draw out a sword after you: and your land shall be desolate, and your cities waste.
lineList.cn: 我要把你们散在列邦中，我也要拔刀追赶你们。你们的地要成为荒场，你们的城邑要变为荒凉。

lineList.en: Then shall the land enjoy her sabbaths, as long as it lieth desolate, and ye be in your enemies' land; even then shall the land rest, and enjoy her sabbaths.
lineList.cn: 你们在仇敌之地居住的时候，你们的地荒凉要享受众安息，正在那时候，地要歇息，享受安息。

lineList.en: As long as it lieth desolate it shall rest; because it did not rest in your sabbaths, when ye dwelt upon it.
lineList.cn: 地多时为荒场，就要多时歇息，地这样歇息，是你们住在其上的安息年所不能得的。

lineList.en: And upon them that are left alive of you I will send a faintness into their hearts in the lands of their enemies; and the sound of a shaken leaf shall chase them; and they shall flee, as fleeing from a sword; and they shall fall when none pursueth.
lineList.cn: 至于你们剩下的人，我要使他们在仇敌之地心惊胆怯。叶子被风吹的响声，要追赶他们，他们要逃避，像人逃避刀剑，无人追赶，却要跌倒。

lineList.en: And they shall fall one upon another, as it were before a sword, when none pursueth: and ye shall have no power to stand before your enemies.
lineList.cn: 无人追赶，他们要彼此撞跌，像在刀剑之前。你们在仇敌面前也必站立不住。

lineList.en: And ye shall perish among the heathen, and the land of your enemies shall eat you up.
lineList.cn: 你们要在列邦中灭亡，仇敌之地要吞吃你们。

lineList.en: And they that are left of you shall pine away in their iniquity in your enemies' lands; and also in the iniquities of their fathers shall they pine away with them.
lineList.cn: 你们剩下的人必因自己的罪孽和祖宗的罪孽在仇敌之地消灭。

lineList.en: If they shall confess their iniquity, and the iniquity of their fathers, with their trespass which they trespassed against me, and that also they have walked contrary unto me;
lineList.cn: 他们要承认自己的罪和他们祖宗的罪，就是干犯我的那罪，并且承认自己行事与我反对，

lineList.en: And that I also have walked contrary unto them, and have brought them into the land of their enemies; if then their uncircumcised hearts be humbled, and they then accept of the punishment of their iniquity:
lineList.cn: 我所以行事与他们反对，把他们带到仇敌之地。那时，他们未受割礼的心若谦卑了，他们也服了罪孽的刑罚，

lineList.en: Then will I remember my covenant with Jacob, and also my covenant with Isaac, and also my covenant with Abraham will I remember; and I will remember the land.
lineList.cn: 我就要记念我与雅各所立的约，与以撒所立的约，与亚伯拉罕所立的约，并要记念这地。

lineList.en: The land also shall be left of them, and shall enjoy her sabbaths, while she lieth desolate without them: and they shall accept of the punishment of their iniquity: because, even because they despised my judgments, and because their soul abhorred my statutes.
lineList.cn: 他们离开这地，地在荒废无人的时候就要享受安息。并且他们要服罪孽的刑罚，因为他们厌弃了我的典章，心中厌恶了我的律例。

lineList.en: And yet for all that, when they be in the land of their enemies, I will not cast them away, neither will I abhor them, to destroy them utterly, and to break my covenant with them: for I am the LORD their God.
lineList.cn: 虽是这样，他们在仇敌之地，我却不厌弃他们，也不厌恶他们，将他们尽行灭绝，也不背弃我与他们所立的约，因为我是耶和华他们的神。

lineList.en: But I will for their sakes remember the covenant of their ancestors, whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt in the sight of the heathen, that I might be their God: I am the LORD.
lineList.cn: 我却要为他们的缘故记念我与他们先祖所立的约。他们的先祖是我在列邦人眼前，从埃及地领出来的，为要作他们的神。我是耶和华。

lineList.en: These are the statutes and judgments and laws, which the LORD made between him and the children of Israel in mount Sinai by the hand of Moses.
lineList.cn: 这些律例，典章，和法度是耶和华与以色列人在西奈山藉着摩西立的。
